name: WP Easy Replace Howdy
author: Asif Ali

sections.description:
Description: This plugin will Replace “Howdy” in the top right corner with “Welcome” of your WordPress dashboard.

Feature

  • This plugin will Replace “Howdy” in the top right corner with “Welcome” of your WordPress dashboard.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder “wp-easy-replace-howdy” to “/wp-content/plugins/” path.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress backend
  3. After activating the plugin, howdy will automatically be replaced with “welcome {username} Message.
  4. Enjoy!
sections.changelog: This is first version with no known errors found
